title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completion rate achieved with tailored reminders, improving data reliability.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven prompts to enhance patient engagement and compliance.
